ARABIC: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This truly is a reminder, so let anyone who wills take the Way towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily this is a reminder. So let him who desires take the way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed this is nothing but a Good Counsel; so let him who will take a way leading to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is a reminder. Let anyone who wants, seek guidance from his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is indeed an advice; so whoever wishes may take the path towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is an admonition, therefore whosoever wills, let him take a path to His Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely this is a reminder, then let him, who will take the way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely this is a Reminder; so let him who will take unto his Lord a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! This is a Reminder. Let him who will, then, choose a way unto his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This, surely, is an admonition. So let him who will, take the right path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this is an admonition; let him therefore, who will, choose a way Unto his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed a reminder. So let anyone who wishes take the way toward his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily this is an Admonition: therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) path to his Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, this is an admonition, therefore whosoever will, let him take a Path to His Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is indeed a Reminder. Let whosoever will take the Path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a reminder. So whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:19] Indeed these, threatening verses, are a reminder, an admonition for all creatures. Let him who will, then, choose a way to his Lord, a path [to Him], through faith and obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! This) surah (is a Reminder) is an admonition and clarification for you. (Let him who will, then, choose a way unto his Lord) a way to head towards Allah; it is also said this means: let him who will use this to return to his Lord.
